cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OR HIS BRITAINIC MAJESTY'3 GOVERNMENT)K^jgjg.R B T C.P. 296 (26)..Copy No.CABINS TIMPERIAL DEFENCE POLICY-Note by the Secretary.The attached Memoranda (C.I.D. Papers Nos. 700-B and 701-B) regarding a Review of Imperial Defence, 1926, are circulated to the Cabinet, by direction of the Prime Minister, for consideration before the Recess.The Minutes cf the 215th Meeting of the Committee of Imperial Defence at which these Papers were considered will be circulated later (CP. 294(26)).(Signed) M.P.A. H&NKEY,Secretary, CabinetsNOTE;The enclosures referred to above are not attached in the case of Ministers who have already received them as Members of the Committee of Imperial Defence?!2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1,28th July, 1926.
